name: Mirror Delivery
description:
Granny ordered some mirrors and the delivery is happening on Friday 13th.

Challenge a friend and play as Luke the delivery boy against the pesky crow!

Luke's goal
Drop all the boxes into the green zone.

Luke's controls (keyboard)
Left/Right arrows: move
Up: jump or climb up ladder
Down: climb down ladder
Space: grab/release crate; buy speed candies
E: consume speed candies

Crow's goal
Prevent Luke from delivering the boxes. Don't get shot by granny. Stay away from Luke and the roofs.

Crow's controls (mouse)
Left mouse button: poop – be sure to be right above Luke!
Right mouse button: collect food from the nest

Creative mode
When browsing the levels, press E to edit it. Create your own levels and share them!

More
The game was developed during js13kgames jam 2013.
Source code: https://github.com/4lbertoC/mirrordelivery
